QuestData.Title: Don't Forget the Eggs!
QuestData.Description: Throughout Azjol-Nerub, the scourged nerubians carefully nurture eggs that will soon hatch, providing them nerubian young to slaughter and raise.$b$bThe eggs have been tainted with foul magics. Our only recourse is to dispose of them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Reclaimer A'zak in Azjol-Nerub wants you to destroy 6 Nerubian Scourge Eggs.
QuestData.RewardText: Do not worry, $r.$B$BThe eggs they found were but a fraction of our hidden stores within Azjol-Nerub.$B$BOur mighty kingdom shall be reborn.
